title: Marks and Krawczynski
description:
Zach talks to Bobby Marks about Ben Simmons, Damian Lillard, and the temporary death of NBA free agency. Then Jon Krawczynski of The Athletic helps preview the Timberwolves under pressure. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
